modShortDescription: Adds an Scrap Axe, Shovel, Pickaxe and Knife. They are better than Stone and Bone tools but worse than Forged Iron ones.
modDescription:
Adds an Scrap Axe, Shovel, Pickaxe and Knife. They are better than Stone and Bone [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) but worse than Forged Iron ones. All are made with Scrap Iron as a base material and can be repaired using Duct Tape.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Snufki-n/Snufkin_Modlets_A19/tree/master/Snufkin_ScrapTools)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22791-snufkins-scrap-tools/).

**Credits:** [Snufkin](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/snufkin/)
